alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry, south central Marion and east central Williamsburg Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rhems, or 16 miles northwest of Georgetown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plantersville around 640 PM EDT. Yauhannah around 645 PM EDT. Murrells Inlet, Burgess, and Bucksport around 700 PM EDT. Garden City around 705 PM EDT. This includes SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
